Character(문자)

08 Aug 2018 • Gmimg

Category: Python
Tags: Python, Character

문자 ASCII, unicode incoding

~~~call by object reference x=10 def change_value(x, val): x=val print(‘{} in change_value’.format(x))

change_value(x,20) print(‘{} in main’.format(x))


=>
20 in change_value
10 in main

~~~str
li=[1,2,3]
def change_val_li(li,idx,val):
    li[idx]=val
    print(str(li)+' in change_val_li')

change_val_li(li,0,55)
print(str(li) +' in main')

=> [55, 2, 3] in change_val_li [55, 2, 3] in main

~~~tuple change tu=(1,2,3) def change_value_tu(tu, *args): tu=args print(str(tu) + ‘ in vhange_val_tu’) return tu tu=change_value_tu(tu,4,5,6) print(str(tu) + ‘ in main’) ~~~
